block.p: Rebecca Alexandra Banks, a daughter of Rosemarie Banks and Dr. Nelson Lee Banks of Dunkirk, N.Y., was married yesterday to Peter Jurdjevic, a son of Deborah and Velimir Jurdjevic of Toronto. The Rev. Cynthia S. Wickwire Lundquist, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at the First Presbyterian Church in Fredonia, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, he cum laude.

Rebecca Alexandra Banks, a daughter of Rosemarie Banks and Dr. Nelson Lee Banks of Dunkirk, N.Y., was married yesterday to Peter Jurdjevic, a son of Deborah and Velimir Jurdjevic of Toronto. The Rev. Cynthia S. Wickwire Lundquist, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at the First Presbyterian Church in Fredonia, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, he cum laude.

Mrs. Jurdjevic, 28, worked in New York until recently for WestLB Panmure Securities, a German investment bank for which she traded Japanese stocks. Next month she is to begin studying for an M.B.A. at Columbia University. Her father, a retired ophthalmologist, practiced in Dunkirk.

Mr. Jurdjevic, 30, is an investment banking associate at Salomon Smith Barney in New York. He received an M.B.A. from New York University. His mother retired as an assistant professor of English literature at the University of Toronto, where his father is a math professor.
